SEARCH

Class LonghornNetworkGUI

java.lang.Object
LonghornNetworkGUI
public class LonghornNetworkGUI extends Object
This class implements the front-end or the graphical user interface for the Longhorn Network application [LN Lab for ECE 422C].
Version:
1.0 Beta
Author:
Abdon Morales, am226923, abdonmorales@my.utexas.edu

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private class 
    LonghornNetworkGUI.GraphPanel
    This class implements the GraphPanel that displays the graph of students in a circular layout using a @see HashMap and ArrayLists to provide the maximum amount of efficiency and quick access times.
    private class 
    LonghornNetworkGUI.UserInfoWindow
    This class implements the user information window that displays the relevant information of a student.

  • Method Details

    • getSearchField

      private JTextField getSearchField()
      This method creates a JTextField for the search bar. It sets the placeholder text for the search bar so users know what to enter. It also sets the font and color of the text field.
      Returns:
      searchField, the JTextField for the search bar
      See Also:
      • JTextField
      • FocusAdapter
      • FocusEvent

    • buildMenuBar

      private void buildMenuBar(JMenuBar menuBar, JFrame frame)
      This helper method builds the menu bar for the GUI. It contains a File menu with options to open a student data file and exit the application. It also includes a Help menu with an "About" item. The menu bar is added to the main frame of the application.
      Parameters:
      menuBar - , the menu bar to be added to the frame
      frame - , the main frame of the application
      See Also:
      • JMenu
      • JMenuBar
      • JFrame

    • getHelpMenu

      private static JMenu getHelpMenu(JFrame frame)
      This method creates the Help menu for the GUI. It contains an "About" item that displays the application version, purpose, and copyright information.
      Parameters:
      frame - , the main frame of the application
      Returns:
      helpMenu, the Help menu with the "About" item
      See Also:
      • JMenu
      • JMenuItem
      • ActionListener
      • JOptionPane

    • studentGraph

      private ActionListener studentGraph()
      This method implements the ActionListener for the display student graph button.
      Returns:
      studentGraph, which is an ActionListener that implements the functionality to display the student graph.
      See Also:
      • ActionListener
      • LonghornNetworkGUI.GraphPanel

    • setLookAndFeel

      private static void setLookAndFeel()
      This method sets the GUI Look and Feel; such as the buttons, color, theme, and other miscellaneous items.

      For this project, and for compatibility, we will be using Sun's Motif Look and Feel interface as seen in Solaris

    • goHome

      private ActionListener goHome(JFrame window)
      This method implements the ActionListener for the return button in the UserInfoWindow and elsewhere.
      Parameters:
      window - , the window to be closed
      Returns:
      goHome, which is an ActionListener that implements the functionality to return to the main menu.
      See Also:
      • JFrame
      • ActionListener

    • search

      private ActionListener search(JTextField searchField)
      This method implements the search functionality for the search button, or whichever component adds it to its ActionListener.
      Parameters:
      searchField - , This passes through the text-field to grab the string that the user typed.
      Returns:
      search, which is an ActionListener that implements the search functionality.
